dcterms:creator: S. Chandrasekhar
dcterms:description: The Linear Radiative Transfer Equations (LRTEs) describe the radiation photons transport and the energy exchange with the background materials, characterized by high dimensionality and multiscale features.
dcterms:title: Linear Radiative Transfer Equations (LRTEs)

dcterms:creator: S. Jin
Z. Ma
K. Wu
dcterms:description: Asymptotic-Preserving Neural Networks (APNNs) are designed to solve multiscale time-dependent linear transport equations, maintaining stability as the Knudsen number approaches zero.
dcterms:title: Asymptotic-Preserving Neural Networks (APNNs)

dcterms:creator: L. Mieussens
dcterms:description: The Unified Gas Kinetic Scheme (UGKS) is a numerical method that preserves the asymptotic properties for the diffusion limit of linear kinetic models.
dcterms:title: Unified Gas Kinetic Scheme (UGKS)

dcterms:creator: I. Sobol'
dcterms:description: The Sobol Sequence is a low-discrepancy sequence used for quasi-Monte Carlo methods, particularly in numerical integration.
dcterms:title: Sobol Sequence

dcterms:creator: M. Raissi
P. Perdikaris
G. E. Karniadakis
dcterms:description: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) provide a framework for solving forward and inverse problems involving nonlinear partial differential equations.
dcterms:title: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs)

dcterms:creator: L. Zhang
T. Luo
Y. Zhang
W. E
Z.-Q. J. Xu
Z. Ma
dcterms:description: Model-Operator-Data Network (MOD-Net) is a machine learning approach that combines model-based and data-driven methods for solving partial differential equations.
dcterms:title: Model-Operator-Data Network (MOD-Net)

dcterms:creator: J. Sirignano
K. Spiliopoulos
dcterms:description: The Deep Galerkin Method (DGM) is a deep learning algorithm designed for solving partial differential equations using a least-squares formulation.
dcterms:title: Deep Galerkin Method (DGM)

dcterms:creator: B. Yu
dcterms:description: The Deep Ritz Method (DRM) is a deep learning-based numerical algorithm for solving variational problems.
dcterms:title: Deep Ritz Method (DRM)

dcterms:creator: K. Wu
X.-b. Yan
S. Jin
Z. Ma
dcterms:description: Asymptotic-Preserving Convolutional DeepONets (APCONs) are designed to capture the diffusive behavior of multiscale linear transport equations.
dcterms:title: Asymptotic-Preserving Convolutional DeepONets (APCONs)

dcterms:creator: J. Hu
S. Jin
dcterms:description: The Stochastic Galerkin Method is a numerical method for solving the Boltzmann equation with uncertainty.
dcterms:title: Stochastic Galerkin Method
